chart.SERVICE_NAME:
select X.* , (select if(count(buy.value)=0,X.cur_price,buy.value) as recent_buy_price
from (select buy as value , strategy_wait_minute, strategy
from coin_slope_strategy
where code = ?
and complete_yn = 'N'
order by date desc
limit 0,1) buy) as recent_buy_price
from (
SELECT *
FROM coin
WHERE code = ?
AND str_to_date(concat(date,time),'%Y%m%d%H%i%S') < date_add(now(), interval ? hour)
ORDER BY date desc, time desc
LIMIT 0,300
) X
order by X.date , X.time

recent_buy_price.SERVICE_NAME:
select if(count(buy.value)=0,-1,buy.value) as recent_buy_price , strategy_wait_minute as recent_wait_minute, strategy as recent_strategy
from (select buy as value , strategy_wait_minute, strategy
from coin_slope_strategy
where code = ?
and 1 != 1
and complete_yn = 'N'
order by date desc
limit 0,1) buy
